verses.roman:
"kāhāṅ gelā kṛṣṇa? ekhani pāinu daraśana!
tāṅhāra saundarya mora harila netra-mana!

synonyms: kāhāṅ—where; gelā kṛṣṇa—has Kṛṣṇa gone; ekhani—just now; pāinu daraśana—I saw; taṅhāra—His; saundarya—beauty; mora—My; harila—has taken away; netra-mana—eyes and mind.
translation: Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "Where has My Kṛṣṇa gone? I saw Him just now, and His beauty has captured My eyes and mind.
